question_text: In what scenario would a 2.5 inch spinning drive be preferable to an SSD in a laptop?
answer_options: When minimizing power usage is critical
When maximum shock resistance is needed
When large storage capacity is needed at lower cost
correct_answer: When large storage capacity is needed at lower cost
explanation: HDDs offer greater capacity per dollar compared to SSDs, making them suitable for bulk storage on a budget despite tradeoffs in speed and durability.
